faq.question: How long is the audio tour?
faq.response: If you are walking, 60 to 90 minutes.  If you are listening within the comfort of your home, 30 minutes

faq.question: Do I need to do all the stops?
faq.response: No, there is no order and you are not required to do all the stops within the audio.

faq.question: How much does it cost?
faq.response: It is free! We do appreciate postive reviews on Trip Advisor and/or Google so that others find us and listen to the audio.

info.title: ABOUT AUDIO WALK
info.descrip: An extraordinary adventure in the old town of Briançon! Travel through time, and visit the Vauban city in a different way. Let us frighten and surprise you as we guide you through the alleys and passages. You will be transported back in time and hear the tales of the fires that have ravaged the town twice, the meeting of witches, and much more! Discover the dark history and legends of Briançon with Briançon Fantômes!

info.title: YOU NEED
info.descrip: You will need a smartphone, headphones, and Internet/Data. Briançon Fantômes takes between 60-90 minutes to complete if you are completing the walk plus audio. It is recommendded to complete the audio tour in the late afternoon or evening because the atmosphere in the old town of Briançon is mystical as dusk arrives.

info.title: WARNING
info.descrip: Briançon Fantômes is not for the faint-hearted! Children under 8 years old are not recommended to listen to the audio tour. The town is steep and has uneven surfaces, please pay attention while walking through and around the old town. Stop in a safe area when listening to the audio for the tour.
